question: who caused to build qutub minar in delhi
vanilla_rag_result: The passages you provided all relate to who caused the Qutub Minar to be built in Delhi, but they do not provide specific information. However, historically, the Qutub Minar was commissioned by Qutb al-Din Aibak, the founder of the Delhi Sultanate, in the late 12th century. It was completed by his successor, Iltutmish.
